original_text: But I have never wanted to worship them or to give them honour. But I have never wanted to worship them or to give them honour. But I have never wanted to worship them
korean_text: 내 마음이 슬며시 유혹되어 내 손에 입맞추었다면

sentences.original_text: But I have never wanted to worship them
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 나는 그들을 경배하고 싶은 적이 없었습니다
또는 그들에게 영광을 주고 싶은 적이 없었습니다
